original_title: The Sallie House - Gateway to the Paranormal
overview: In 1906 a legend was born in Atchison, Kansas in what is now known as the Sallie House. A young girl died in excruciating pain on the operating table and now forever haunts this accursed and evil dwelling. Join internationally renown psychic Robbie Thomas and EVP specialist, Michael Esposito as they embark
title: The Sallie House - Gateway to the Paranormal
